documentation.text:
@dev Contract module which provides a basic access control mechanism, where
 there is an account (an bigBro) that can be granted exclusive access to
 specific functions.
 By default, the bigBro account will be the one that deploys the contract. This
 can later be changed with {transferbigBroship}.
 This module is used through inheritance. It will make available the modifier
 `PRIVATE`, which can be applied to your functions to restrict their use to
 the bigBro.
@dev Initializes the contract setting the deployer as the initial bigBro.
@dev Returns the address of the current bigBro.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Ownable: FUNCTION IS PRIVATE TO bigBro"

arguments.value: Ownable: FUNCTION IS PRIVATE TO bigBro

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Ownable: FUNCTION IS PRIVATE TO bigBro"

documentation.text: @dev Throws if called by any account other than the bigBro.

@dev Leaves the contract without bigBro. It will not be possible to call
 `PRIVATE` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current bigBro.
 NOTE: Renouncing bigBroship will leave the contract without an bigBro,
 thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the bigBro.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Ownable: new bigBro is the zero address"

arguments.value: Ownable: new bigBro is the zero address

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Ownable: new bigBro is the zero address"

documentation.text:
@dev Transfers bigBroship of the contract to a new account (`newbigBro`).
 Can only be called by the current bigBro.

devdoc.details: Contract module which provides a basic access control mechanism, where there is an account (an bigBro) that can be granted exclusive access to specific functions. By default, the bigBro account will be the one that deploys the contract. This can later be changed with {transferbigBroship}. This module is used through inheritance. It will make available the modifier `PRIVATE`, which can be applied to your functions to restrict their use to the bigBro.

bigBro().details: Returns the address of the current bigBro.

constructor.details: Initializes the contract setting the deployer as the initial bigBro.

renouncebigBrother().details: Leaves the contract without bigBro. It will not be possible to call `PRIVATE` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current bigBro. NOTE: Renouncing bigBroship will leave the contract without an bigBro, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the bigBro.

transferbigBroship(address).details: Transfers bigBroship of the contract to a new account (`newbigBro`). Can only be called by the current bigBro.
